goodbyeMessage: Thank you for using the i18ntk settings manager!
relativePathHint: Use relative paths from this directory (e.g., ./src/i18n/locales)

mainMenu.title: Main Menu:
mainMenu.updatePackageDesc: Update the i18n-toolkit package via npm
mainMenu.reportBugDesc: Submit an issue report on GitHub
mainMenu.quitDesc: Exit settings (with save prompt if needed)
mainMenu.saveChangesBeforeQuit: Do you want to save changes before quitting? (y/N):
mainMenu.goodbyeMessage: Thank you for using the i18n settings manager!
mainMenu.selectSettingPrompt: Select a setting to edit (or 'b' to go back):
mainMenu.scriptDirectoryDesc: Specify custom directories for each script
mainMenu.scriptDirectorySettingsDesc: You can set custom directories for each script. If not set, global settings will be used.

updatePackage.title: Update Package
updatePackage.description: Update the i18n-toolkit package via npm
updatePackage.prompt: Do you want to update the package now? (y/N):
updatePackage.promptDesc: Note: This will update the i18ntk package to the latest version.

admin.setupPinPrompt: Would you like to set up an admin PIN? (y/N):
admin.setupFailed: ‚ùå Failed to set up admin PIN. Setting not changed.
admin.verifyToRemove: üîê Verify current PIN to remove protection:
admin.noPinConfigured: üîì No admin PIN is currently configured.
admin.pinBenefits: Setting up admin PIN will add security for:

importExport.enterFilename: Enter filename (or press Enter for default):
importExport.confirmImport: This will replace all current settings. Continue? (y/N):

resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to continue? (y/N):

theme.label: Color Theme
theme.help: Choose between light and dark themes

dateFormat.label: Date Format
dateFormat.help: Choose how dates are displayed in reports

enabled.label: Enable Notifications
enabled.help: Enable desktop notifications for completed operations

sourceDir.label: Source Directory
sourceDir.help: Path to directory with source translation files

sourceLanguage.label: Source Language
sourceLanguage.help: The primary language used as source for translations

outputDir.label: Output Directory
outputDir.help: Where reports and processed files will be saved

batchSize.label: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of items processed per batch
batchSize.help: How many files to process in each batch

maxConcurrentFiles.label: Max Concurrent Files
maxConcurrentFiles.help: Maximum number of files to process at the same time

sizingThreshold.label: Sizing Threshold (%)
sizingThreshold.help: Percentage threshold for detecting size mismatches

strictMode.label: Strict Validation Mode
strictMode.help: Enable strict validation for translation files

enableAuditLog.label: Enable Audit Log
enableAuditLog.help: Log all changes made to translation files

backupBeforeChanges.label: Auto Backup
backupBeforeChanges.help: Automatically create backups before making changes

scriptDirectories_analyze.label: Analyze Script Directories
scriptDirectories_analyze.help: Specify custom source directory for the analyze script. Leave empty to use global setting.

scriptDirectories_complete.label: Complete Setup Directories
scriptDirectories_complete.description: Custom directories for complete setup script
scriptDirectories_complete.help: Specify custom source directory for the complete setup script. Leave empty to use global setting.

scriptDirectories_init.label: Initialize Script Directories
scriptDirectories_init.help: Specify custom source directory for the initialize script. Leave empty to use global setting.

scriptDirectories_manage.label: Manage Script Directories
scriptDirectories_manage.help: Specify custom source directory for the manage script. Leave empty to use global setting.

scriptDirectories_sizing.label: Sizing Script Directories
scriptDirectories_sizing.help: Specify custom source directory for the sizing script. Leave empty to use global setting.

scriptDirectories_summary.label: Summary Report Directories
scriptDirectories_summary.description: Custom directories for summary report script
scriptDirectories_summary.help: Specify custom source directory for the summary report script. Leave empty to use global setting.

scriptDirectories_usage.label: Usage Report Directories
scriptDirectories_usage.description: Custom directories for usage report script
scriptDirectories_usage.help: Specify custom source directory for the usage report script. Leave empty to use global setting.

scriptDirectories_validate.label: Validate Script Directories
scriptDirectories_validate.help: Specify custom source directory for the validate script. Leave empty to use global setting.

actions.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? (y/N):

help.title: Settings Help
help.navigation: Use number keys to select options, 'b' to go back
help.editing: Enter new values when prompted, or press Enter to keep current
help.saving: Use 's' to save changes before quitting
help.reset: Use option 7 to reset all settings to defaults

selectSettingPrompt: Select setting to edit (or b for back):
enterNewValue: Enter new value (or press Enter to keep current):
noHelp: No help available for this setting
